page.title: 05Seabird Rescue Unit
page.content: John Sillett runs a wildlife and oiled seabird rescue unit ,mainly dealing with seabirds in the winter, cleaning, feeding and the eventual release of guillemots, razorbills, puffins etc. The unit also deals with garden birds, mammals and birds of prey.The unit is part of two organisations, Suffolk Coast Oiled Bird Trust and Suffolk Wildlife Rescue Association. All work is voluntary and relies heavily on people's generosity with gifts of fish, food etc. The unit works closely with local people (especially children) with emphasis on locating and reporting sightings of oiled / injured birds etc, leading to capture for treatment. contact Mr.J. Sillett tel. 730278.
